vulnerabilities.debugMessage: Use of cryptographically weak pseudo-random number generator java.lang.System.arraycopy for key. Cryptographically secure functions: [java.security.SecureRandom.generateSeed, java.security.SecureRandom.getSeed, java.security.SecureRandom.next, java.security.SecureRandom.nextBytes, os.urandom, secrets.SystemRandom, secrets.compare_digest, secrets.randbelow, secrets.randbits, secrets.token_bytes, secrets.token_hex, secrets.token_urlsafe]

Use of cryptographically weak pseudo-random number generator java.lang.System.arraycopy for initialization vector (IV). Cryptographically secure functions: [java.security.SecureRandom.generateSeed, java.security.SecureRandom.getSeed, java.security.SecureRandom.next, java.security.SecureRandom.nextBytes, os.urandom, secrets.SystemRandom, secrets.compare_digest, secrets.randbelow, secrets.randbits, secrets.token_bytes, secrets.token_hex, secrets.token_urlsafe]
